task.title: Viewing memory statistics by using the
task.shortdesc: Use the Server monitor to view statistics about memory.

context.p: You can view statistics about memory by using the , by using a , or by using an external monitoring application. For more information about using a to view memory statistics, see Viewing memory statistics by using . For more information about using an external application to view memory statistics, see Viewing memory by using an external application. For more information about the statistical data that you can view, see Memory Monitoring.

step.cmd: From the , select Monitoring Server to view memory statistics.
Click Refresh to update the statistical information displayed.

result.p: The statistical data in the table is updated.
The Timestamp is updated to show the time that refreshed data is generated.
